title: BitWalker28
author: BitWalker28
content: I have been tinkering with a USB miner consisting of 2 BM1387b chips.  My question is, what firmware do I need in order for the PC to recognize the miner when in the USB port?  I am assuming some type of bootloader.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Are you talking about Compact F USB miner?I think you don't need to flash this miner with firmware if it does not recognize it might be a driver issue.I heard that it needs zadig generic WinUSB driver to make this USB miner visible.You can find this driver under this thread below- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1764803.0

comments.author: BitWalker28
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on April 25, 2023, 03:27:04 PMAre you talking about Compact F USB miner?I think you don't need to flash this miner with firmware if it does not recognize it might be a driver issue.I heard that it needs zadig generic WinUSB driver to make this USB miner visible.You can find this driver under this thread below- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1764803.0Yes.  I need to flash the miner with firmware but I'm not really sure which I need to use.  I understand the the WinUSB drivers.

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Quote from: BitWalker28 on April 26, 2023, 12:18:58 AMQuote from: BitMaxz on April 25, 2023, 03:27:04 PMAre you talking about Compact F USB miner?I think you don't need to flash this miner with firmware if it does not recognize it might be a driver issue.I heard that it needs zadig generic WinUSB driver to make this USB miner visible.You can find this driver under this thread below- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1764803.0Yes.  I need to flash the miner with firmware but I'm not really sure which I need to use.  I understand the the WinUSB drivers.  There is no 'firmware' to be flashed to the stick. It uses the cgminer program tha is ran on a PC. Any 'ux preferred but yes there is a Windows version as well. That thread will cover what you need to know.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Hi OP !Here you will find all the necessary steps to be able to install and use properly your CompacF with Windows :https://www.bitshopper.de/en/support/instructions/compac-f/compac-f-setup-windows/This thread will help you too I guess : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1779423.0You just need to install CGminer to run it.Kano did a great job here if you need more troubleshooting processes : https://kano.is/gekko.php
